exerciseCommunitySolutions.exploreSoluti:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the community solutions list.
**UI Location**: Exercise community solutions list, main heading.
**When Users See This**: When the component successfully loads community solutions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Explore how others solved this exercise"
exerciseCommunitySolutions.searchPlaceho:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the search input field.
**UI Location**: Exercise community solutions list, search bar.
**When Users See This**: When the search input field is empty.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; indicates minimum character requirement.
**Current English**: "Search by code (min 3 chars)"
